BIT_SIZE.doc: BIT_SIZE(I) returns the number of bits in the integer model for I. [F90]

BTEST.doc: BTEST(I,POS) returns .TRUE. if bit POS of integer I is set to 1. [F90]

IAND.doc: IAND(I,J) returns the bitwise logical AND of integers I and J. [F90]

IOR.doc: IOR(I,J) returns the bitwise logical inclusive OR of integers I and J. [F90]

IEOR.doc: IEOR(I,J) returns the bitwise logical exclusive OR of integers I and J. [F90]

IBCLR.doc: IBCLR(I,POS) returns I with the bit at position POS set to zero. [F90]

IBSET.doc: IBSET(I,POS) returns I with the bit at position POS set to one. [F90]

IBITS.doc: IBITS(I,POS,LEN) extracts LEN bits from I starting at bit position POS. [F90]

ISHFT.doc: ISHFT(I,SHIFT) returns I with bits shifted SHIFT places (left if positive). [F90]

ISHFTC.doc: ISHFTC(I,SHIFT,SIZE) performs circular shift of rightmost SIZE bits of I. [F90]

NOT.doc: NOT(I) returns the bitwise logical complement of integer I. [F90]
